channel.title: Chain Mail
channel.description:
omfg Im getting sick of this shit!!!! i got sent one >_> and then the same one. and then another one of that..... i replyed!!!
"Sigh. Chain Mail, I'd like too see one of these work....
Oo i have one, Do this other wise you will get ran over by a bus, shot with a 22 shotgun and set on fire >_>
send this e-mail to 2193284 people other wise the above will happen ^^^^^ :P
how can we stop this shit?

it was a faith in god thingy at church…

item.title: Chain Mail
item.dc:creator: @M0rtion M0rtion
item.description:
@M0rtion wrote:

wtf, why did you watch somone getting shot and ran over by a bus… anyhoo
( i guesse she didn’t send it too all the people… tisk tisk tisk.,…)

folks yu should allways listen to chainmail!!! [/sarcasim] <3 love good people
</3 MSN chain mail noobs

item.title: Chain Mail
item.dc:creator: @animefreak animefreak
item.description:
@animefreak wrote:

hehe makes me think of a video we saw at church when some girl was at a party and her friend got shot :eek:, so while she was running from the attacker she got hit by a bus on the streets.( yes she was in fact blonde,) i was the only one laughing…searsouly i was trying not to laugh up and everyone was just staring at
me cuz i was spiting from trying to hold it in…im carcking up right now thinking about it!!
just umm get a secret email…and ignore oddly titled emails.

Read full topic
